channel.title: aws api gateway on madhead
channel.description: Recent content in aws api gateway on madhead

item.title: Java classes for server-side App Store receipts validation
item.description: I’m working on a bunch of apps that need to verify App Store receipts on a JVM-based server. The process is described in Apples’s Documentation Archive but lacks of any SDK / libraries (at least for JVM). So I made one to improve code reuse.

item.title: Java classes for AWS Lambda Proxy Integration
item.description: When I had to configure Lambda Proxy Integrations in AWS API Gateway for the second time for a week I thought about extracting Java classes in a small library for later reuse.
